name: Gravity Swap (Ellis James Game Studios)
description:
Gravity Swap is a fun mimimalistic platformer where you must swap gravity to reach areas you couldn't before.  Your only goal is to reach the exit. Some levels have multiple ways to get there.

Try and beat the 10 levels currently available in the game.

Explore two zones the white and blue zone. White is easier than blue.

At some point i will release the source code for the game comment below if you would like me to publish it.
